statements: DELETE FROM IoTData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM Sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND device_id = 'x1y2z3' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DeviceStatus WHERE status_id = '43509fbc-0b71-4cb1-9b69-234dd3bd22f2' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM ErrorLog WHERE device_id = 1 AND error_message = 'Connection lost';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sensor_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity');
DELETE FROM DeviceAlerts WHERE device_id = 10 AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
